response.summary: Electronic engineer with a passion for light as an element that connects art, design and new technologies. Curious, responsible, analytical, constantly seeking for new challenges, persistant, with high skills of adaptation, leadership and teamwork. Enthusiastic to work in interdisciplinary projects and exchange knowledge.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Trabajo en equipo, Comunicación, Teamwork, Lighting Control, Lighting Design, Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, C++, Dialux, Ltspice, Kicad, Python, Linux, AutoCAD, SQL, Bash, Computer Networking, Network Administration

profile_positions.description:
- Development of interior and exterior lighting projects of various types: commercial, urban, architectural.
- Support the development of lighting schematics and documentation of the various phases of design including diagrams, images, plans, real and virtual models, specifications, budgets and lighting calculations.
- Support Lead Designer activities: lighting calculations, rendering and simulation.
profile_positions.title: Lighting Designer

profile_positions.description:
- Monitor and correct data metrics before billing.
- Analyze billing data.
- Optimize daily processes through development.
profile_positions.title: Billing system analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Model plans and 2D and 3D files.
- Preliminary project analysis.
- Support the presentation of the final project concept.
- Ensure the lighting measurements via the software.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Lighting designer

profile_positions.description: - Provide technical support for telecommuting and in-office connections.
profile_positions.title: Analyst - helpdesk

company.name: VOYONS VOIR Lighting Design
company.description: Based in Paris, VOYONS VOIR performs for 20 years the lighting design of high-end projects – architecture (indoors / outdoors) and landscape. Exploring the highlighting language as one of the vectors of expression in architecture, paying particular attention to detail integration, and very concerned with maintaining an in-depth knowledge and constantly renewed lighting technologies, our wish is to meet the requirements of our clients and work in perfect synergy with the architects, decorators, and landscapers. With worldwide experience, VOYONS VOIR has acquired a strong experience in luxury hotels, high-end housing estates (villas, penthouses, chalets), mega-yacht, retail (fine jewelry, leather goods, tableware,…), and premium office buildings. Through those projects, VOYONS VOIR also creates specific light fixtures for architectural highlights and decorative lamps. Around his founder, Stéphane CARRATERO, VOYONS VOIR brings together an experienced and international team of 13 designers. Our method is a mix of the most advanced technologies and experimental roleplay situations (lighting test of materials, mock-ups, and prototypes). .). This approach allows us to manage any size of the project, from the design phase to the phase of adjustment of the different light atmospheres on site.
